member.summary: The mainboard class for the FEZ Cerbuino Bee.

member.summary: Constructs a new instance.

member.summary: The storage device volume names supported by this mainboard.

member.summary: Mounts the device with the given name.
member.param: The device to mount.
member.returns: Whether or not the mount was successful.

member.name: M:GHIElectronics.Gadgeteer.FEZCerbuinoBee.EnsureRgbSocketPinsAvailable
member.summary: Ensures that the RGB socket pins are available by disabling the display controller if needed.

member.summary: Sets the state of the debug LED.
member.param: The new state.

member.name: M:GHIElectronics.Gadgeteer.FEZCerbuinoBee.SetProgrammingMode(Gadgeteer.Mainboard.ProgrammingInterface)
member.summary: Sets the programming mode of the device.
member.param: The new programming mode.

member.name: M:GHIElectronics.Gadgeteer.FEZCerbuinoBee.PostInit
member.summary: This performs post-initialization tasks for the mainboard. It is called by Gadgeteer.Program.Run and does not need to be called manually.

member.name: M:GHIElectronics.Gadgeteer.FEZCerbuinoBee.OnOnboardControllerDisplayConnected(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,Gadgeteer.Modules.Module.DisplayModule.TimingRequirements)
member.summary: Configure the onboard display controller to fulfil the requirements of a display using the RGB sockets. If doing this requires rebooting, then the method must reboot and not return. If there is no onboard display controller, then NotSupportedException must be thrown.
member.param: Display model name.
Display physical width in pixels, ignoring the orientation setting.
Display physical height in lines, ignoring the orientation setting.
Display orientation in degrees.
The required timings from an LCD controller.

member.summary: The name of the mainboard.
